Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ChromosomesThis class is used to store chromosome DNA sequences
FileBufferClass for reading lines from file or standard input
GenomicIntervalSet of CIGAR operations that map to the fragment sequence (SAM format)
GenomicIntervalSetAsArray[UNDER DEVELOPMENT] This class implements an array of genomic intervals
GenomicRegionThis class implements the genomic regions (i.e. ordered sets of genomic intervals)
GenomicRegionBEDThis class processes genomic regions in BED format
GenomicRegionBEDToREGThis class reads BED files but converts them internally to the REG format, so all operations are performed on the REG format
GenomicRegionGFFThis class processes genomic regions in SAM format
GenomicRegionGFFToREGThis class reads GFF files but converts them internally to the REG format, so all operations are performed on the REG format
GenomicRegionSAMThis class processes genomic regions in SAM format
GenomicRegionSAMToREGThis class reads SAM files but converts them internally to the REG format, so all operations are performed on the REG format
GenomicRegionSetThis class is used to read and manipulate a set of genomic regions from a file or from standard input
GenomicRegionSetOverlapsAbstract class for computing overlaps between genomic regions
GenomicRegionSetScannerThis class is used to scan a set of regions by sliding windows. See detailed description below for an example
ProgressThis class is used to report progress of loop computations
SortedGenomicRegionSetOverlapsThis class is used to find overlaps between two genomic regions sets. See detailed description below for an example
UnsortedGenomicRegionSetOverlapsClass for computing overlaps between unsorted regions
